Uses of Class
groovyx.net.http.URIBuilder

Packages that use URIBuilder
groovyx.net.http HTTPBuilder provides a simple Groovy API for HTTP and REST client operations.

 URIBuilder URIBuilder.setUserInfo(String userInfo)
          Set the userInfo portion of the URI, or null if the URI should have no user information.
